title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Indigenous Youth Storytelling Through Digital Self-Expression

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 2-minute digital documentary draft reflecting their cultural identity using a smartphone
Learners can critically analyze social issues in Indigenous communities and connect them to visual storytelling
Learners can revise and improve their work based on peer feedback to complete a final presentation video.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
